title: Trip of the week: Norfolk
text:

Trip of the week: Norfolk Travel By Cindy Decker Dispatch • Sunday July 19, 2015 5:00 AM 
Each week, Travel Editor Cindy Decker highlights an interesting travel package sent to her inbox. 
Norfolk Family Getaway 
VISIT NORFOLK TODAY, 1-800-368-3097, www.visitnorfolktoday.com 
THE TRIP: This package for a family of four is based at the Norfolk Waterside Marriott hotel. 
The overnight accommodations must include a Friday- or Saturday-night stay, which will feature a breakfast buffet for two adults and two children ages 12 or younger. 
While in Norfolk, families can participate in a variety of fun educational activities such as glass blowing at the Chrysler Museum of Art’s Glass Studio or taking sailing lessons at Sail Nauticus. 
Attractions in the Norfolk area include the Norfolk Botanical Garden, the Douglas MacArthur Memorial, the Virginia Zoo and the maritime-themed Nauticus museum featuring the Battleship Wisconsin. 
THE COST: from $169 a night 
@DispatchTravel
